Sentencas: In this paper the influence of pressure on the performance of solid oxide electrolysis cells is theoretically analyzed in a pressure range between 0.05 and 2 MPa.
Titulo: Theoretical study on pressurized operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: A previously validated electrochemical model of a solid oxide fuel cell stack is used to predict electrolysis behavior.
Titulo: Theoretical study on pressurized operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The effect of pressure on thermodynamics, kinetics and gas diffusion is discussed.
Titulo: Theoretical study on pressurized operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: It is shown that thermodynamics are negatively influenced by an increase in pressure whereas kinetics and gas transport are improved.
Titulo: Theoretical study on pressurized operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Overall pressure effects are therefore only small.
Titulo: Theoretical study on pressurized operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: At low current density the electrolysis cell shows better performance at low pressure whereas performance improves with pressure at high current densities.
Titulo: Theoretical study on pressurized operation of solid oxide electrolysis cells
